content: अनंश {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] {@--1@} Not entitled to a share in the inheritance; °शौ क्लीबपतितौ जात्यंधबधिरौ तथा . उन्मत्तजडमूकाश्च ये च केचिन्निरिंद्रियाः .. <ls>Ms. 9. 201.</ls> Other persons are also mentioned by Devala, Baudhāyana, <ls>Kātyāyana</ls> and <ls>Nārada.</ls> {@--2@} Without parts, undivided, portionless; an epithet of the sky or the Supreme Being.
